titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1580) to prohibit investment in, and certain other activities with respect to, South Africa, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-857.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 246 - 159 (Record Vote No: 282).

bill.summary: 8/10/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1580 (South Africa sanctions).
